abstract: BAE Systems, the defense contractor, said Friday it has sold a 10.25 percent stake in Swedish defense company Saab for $149 million, as part of an ongoing divestment process, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: BAE Systems, the defense contractor, said Friday it has sold a 10.25 percent stake in Swedish defense company Saab for $149 million, as part of an ongoing divestment process, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Defense contractor BAE Systems said Friday it has sold a 10.25 percent stake in Swedish defense company Saab for 1.066 billion kronor ($149 million), as part of an ongoing divestment process, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: BAE Sells 10% Stake in Defense Firm Saab
